TEXT.TITLE: CERTIFICATED COTTON STOCKS
TEXT.BODY: Certificated cotton stocks deliverable on the New York Cotton Exchange No 2 cotton futures contract as of April 8 were reported at 34,661 bales, down 421 bales from the previous day's figure. There were no bales awaiting review and 1,218 bales awaiting decertification. Reuter
